name: wr_arc_grandfather_01_02
text: My paternal great-grandfather was high priest in Zaru'Kina.
text_simple: my paternal greatgrandfather was high priest in zarukina

name: wr_arc_grandfather_02_02
text: He despised the windwalkers of the Gale. Resented their influence.
text_simple: he despised the windwalkers of the gale resented their influence

name: wr_arc_grandfather_03
text: So when his son fell in love with a member of the Gale's oldest family, he saw an opportunity.
text_simple: so when his son fell in love with a member of the gales oldest family he saw an opportunity

name: wr_arc_grandfather_04_02
text: He did not rush. He sanctioned their union. Welcomed my grandmother into the village with open arms.
text_simple: he did not rush he sanctioned their union welcomed my grandmother into the village with open arms

name: wr_arc_grandfather_05
text: He spent time with members of the Order. Learned as much as he could about our ways.
text_simple: he spent time with members of the order learned as much as he could about our ways

name: wr_arc_grandfather_06_02
text: Then, slowly but surely, he began to sow the seeds of fear and doubt about the true motives of those embraced by the Gale.
text_simple: then slowly but surely he began to sow the seeds of fear and doubt about the true motives of those embraced by the gale

name: wr_arc_grandfather_07_02
text: In the minds of my grandmother and a growing number of villagers.
text_simple: in the minds of my grandmother and a growing number of villagers

name: wr_arc_grandfather_08
text: So slowly that the changes were almost imperceptible. Until it was entirely too late.
text_simple: so slowly that the changes were almost imperceptible until it was entirely too late

name: wr_arc_grandmother_01_02
text: My grandmother was different than her sisters. She was...ungifted in the ways of the Gale.
text_simple: my grandmother was different than her sisters she was ungifted in the ways of the gale

name: wr_arc_grandmother_02
text: In those days, even though they lived apart, the order of the Rising Gale played an important role in Zaru'Kinan affairs.
text_simple: in those days even though they lived apart the order of the rising gale played an important role in zarukinan affairs

name: wr_arc_grandmother_03_02
text: Together with the worshippers of the Angvol, theirs was the counsel the village elders would seek in guiding the people.
text_simple: together with the worshippers of the angvol theirs was the counsel the village elders would seek in guiding the people

name: wr_arc_grandmother_04
text: Unlike those who prayed to the Angvol, the Rising Gale was not an open congregation.
text_simple: unlike those who prayed to the angvol the rising gale was not an open congregation

name: wr_arc_grandmother_05_02
text: You were either born into the Order, or you weren't.
text_simple: you were either born into the order or you werent

name: wr_arc_grandmother_06
text: But it was very rare for one of my family line to be born without the blessings of mother wind.
text_simple: but it was very rare for one of my family line to be born without the blessings of mother wind

name: wr_arc_grandmother_07_02
text: So it was only natural that my grandmother would make a normal life for herself in Zaru'Kina.
text_simple: so it was only natural that my grandmother would make a normal life for herself in zarukina

name: wr_arc_grandmother_08
text: That she would find comfort, and love, there. Amongst the normal people.
text_simple: that she would find comfort and love there amongst the normal people
